items.title: Winter

items.title: UHP
items.description: Used on sports and super cars in warm weather, sporty handling, and quick acceleration

items.title: Summer
items.description: For dry roads and warm, arid climates

items.title: All Weather
items.description: Combines an All Season and Winter tire traits for strong traction year-round

items.title: Performance
items.description: For sport/luxury vehicles and high-speed handling

items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: Touring
items.description: For durability and smooth long rides

items.title: Sport
items.description: Sport Trucks typically feature a wide, low profile and offer drivers responsive handling and strong traction on paved roads.

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 235-50r18 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 235/50R18 Tire Size 235/50R18 tires are found on a wide variety of vehicles such as muscle cars, luxury sedans, and compact SUVs. If you drive an Acura TLX, Ford Mustang, Buick Regal TourX, Cadillac CT6, Chevrolet Impala, or Mercedes-Benz GLA250, there’s a good chance your car has 235/50R18 tires, and a brand new version of one of these cars might come with a set of Bridgestone Turanza EL440, [Pirelli P Zero Nero All Season] (https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero-nero-all-season), Michelin Primacy MXM4, Goodyear Eagle Sport All-Season, Firestone Firehawk GT, or Continental ProContact TX SSR tires attached. Popular vehicles: 2021 Acura TLX
2006-2021 Ford Mustang
2011-2020 Buick Regal TourX
2016-2020 Cadillac CT6
2006-2020 Chevrolet Impala A sedan or luxury sedan like the Chevrolet Impala or Cadillac CT6 is often at its best when paired with a set of all-season tires. Check out the Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4, Nokian One, [Toyo Extensa A/S II(https://simpletire.com/brands/toyo-tires/extensa-a-s-ii), or Nexen N Priz AH8 if you want a new set of 235/50R18 all-season tires that aren’t original equipment. Drivers of muscle cars like the Ford Mustang typically use ultra-high-performance tires on their ride to bring out their sporty traction and handling. If you’re looking for a set of 235/50R18 ultra-high-performance tires for a muscle car like the Ford Mustang then check out the [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 Plus](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus), BFGoodrich g-Force COMP-2 A/S+, Nitto NT555 G2, or Kumho Ecsta PS31. While passenger tires are more than capable of being used on compact SUVs like the Buick Regal TourX, some drivers prefer SUV specific tires due to their ability to handle a higher center of gravity. Consider the Pirelli Scorpion Verde All Season, Falken Ziex CT60 A/S, [Yokohama Geolandar CV G058](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-cv-g058), or Hankook Dynapro HP2. Whether you drive an Acura TLX, Ford Mustang, Chevrolet Impala or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 205/65R16 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
